verbs.description: Kathy Griffin [V: is] taking back an apology she issued last year after she was photographed holding what appeared to be the severed head of President Donald Trump .
[ARG0: Kathy Griffin] is [V: taking] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: an apology she issued last year after she was photographed holding what appeared to be the severed head of President Donald Trump] .

Kathy Griffin is taking back [ARG1: an apology] [ARG0: she] [V: issued] [ARGM-TMP: last year] [ARGM-TMP: after she was photographed holding what appeared to be the severed head of President Donald Trump] .
Kathy Griffin is taking back an apology she issued last year after she [V: was] photographed holding what appeared to be the severed head of President Donald Trump .
Kathy Griffin is taking back an apology she issued last year after [ARG1: she] was [V: photographed] [ARG2: holding what appeared to be the severed head of President Donald Trump] .
Kathy Griffin is taking back an apology she issued last year after [ARG0: she] was photographed [V: holding] [ARG1: what appeared to be the severed head of President Donald Trump] .
Kathy Griffin is taking back an apology she issued last year after she was photographed holding [ARG1: what] [V: appeared] [C-ARG1: to be the severed head of President Donald Trump] .
Kathy Griffin is taking back an apology she issued last year after she was photographed holding [ARG1: what] appeared to [V: be] [ARG2: the severed head of President Donald Trump] .
Kathy Griffin is taking back an apology she issued last year after she was photographed holding what appeared to be the [V: severed] [ARG1: head] of President Donald Trump .
